name: My Pet Zombie 2
blurb: My Pet Zombie 2 is a fun virtual world where players can adopt, raise, customize and play with their own pet zombie.

rewards.reward: We will love you forever! Plus you'll get a really fun desktop and mobile wallpaper!

We will love you for infinity! 

You'll get a really fun desktop and mobile wallpaper.

Plus you'll get your name on a headstone in the "People We Love" page in the My Pet Zombie 2 game credits!

We will love you for forever + infinity! You'll get your name on a headstone in VIP section  on the "People We Love" page in the My Pet Zombie 2 game credits, plus you'll get your name on a headstone in the zombie graveyard in the game. The zombie graveyard is where all players will go to play mini games.

You're the coolest! Plus you can design a 10 items clothing pack that we will create for the My Pet Zombie store. You tell us what clothing items you want to see in the game and we will create them! You can also name your clothing pack! Plus you'll get your name on a headstone in VIP bronze section  on the "People We Love" page in the My Pet Zombie 2 game credits!

You're amazing! Plus you can help us create a line of clothing for the My Pet Zombie clothing store. You will name the clothing line and tell us what you want to see. You can design 20 clothing items and we will create them! This clothing line will be featured in the "Featured Pack of the Day" section in the clothing store with your name as the clothing designer! Plus you'll get your name on a headstone in VIP silver section  on the "People We Love" page in the My Pet Zombie 2 game credits!

You will receive a My Pet Zombie t-shirt and a collectors edition My Pet Zombie designer toy (only 100 will be made). \r\n\r\nPlus you can help us create a line of clothing for the My Pet Zombie clothing store. You will name the clothing line and tell us what you want to see. You can design 20 clothing items and we will create them! This clothing line will be featured in the "Featured Pack of the Week" section in the clothing store with your name as the clothing designer! Plus you'll get your name on a headstone in VIP gold section  on the "People We Love" page in the My Pet Zombie 2 game credits!

You will receive a My Pet Zombie t-shirt, a collectors edition My Pet Zombie designer toy (only 50 will be made), a lifetime supply of bones and bites in the game.\r\n\r\nPlus we will create a zombie in your likeness for the game, and feature you in a secret location. You may be a shop owner, the grounds keeper of the graveyard, a statue or one of many featured characters in the game!

You will receive a My Pet Zombie t-shirt, a collectors edition My Pet Zombie designer toy (only 25 will be made), a lifetime supply of bones and bites in the game, and a collectors edition My Pet Zombie plush toy (only 25 will be made). Plus we will create a zombie in your likeness for the game, and feature you you in a secret location. You may be a shop owner, the grounds keeper of the graveyard, a statue or one of many featured characters in the game!

You will receive a My Pet Zombie t-shirt, a collectors edition My Pet Zombie designer toy (only 10 will be made), a collectors edition My Pet Zombie plush toy (only 10 will be made), a lifetime supply of bones and bites in the game, a one of a kind My Pet Zombie oil painting (only 10 will be made), and you can decide what one of the mini games is going to be. You'll choose the name of the mini game, decide what it is and we will build it! Plus we will create a zombie in your likeness for the game, and feature you you in a secret location. You may be a shop owner, the grounds keeper of the graveyard, a statue or one of many featured characters in the game!

You will receive a My Pet Zombie t-shirt, a collectors edition My Pet Zombie designer toy (only 1 will be made), a collectors edition My Pet Zombie plush toy (only 1 will be made), a lifetime supply of bones and bites in the game, a one of a kind My Pet Zombie oil painting (only 1 will be made) and we will make you the mayor of Zombieville! We will create a golden statue of you that will be hoisted in front of city hall in the game for all to see! Every player in the game will be able to walk up to your statue and high five you.
